original_text: Judah's soldiers turned around. They saw that Jeroboam's soldiers were in front of them and behind them. So they called out to the Lord for help. The priests made a noise with their trumpets.
korean_text: 유다 사람이 뒤를 돌아보고 자기 앞 뒤의 적병으로 말미암아 여호와께 부르짖고 제사장들은 나팔을 부니라

sentences.original_text: They saw that Jeroboam's soldiers were in front of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여로보암의 군사들이 자기들 앞에 있는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: So they called out to the Lord for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 도움을 청하기 위해 주께 부르짖었다

sentences.original_text: The priests made a noise with their trumpets
